changeSet.author: m.vuckovic
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `expense-tracker-docker`.`income_group` ( `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `description` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 2 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
